title: New client help
body: So I'm using the old client but I want to use the new one. Whenever I try tho it says I have to reinstall the alpha clients and so it's impossible for me to use the new client. What can I do?

replies.body:
This error usually crops up if something went wrong with the patching or updating process. You should be able to resolve this if you force the patcher to complete the upgrade again. To do this, we'll first need you to hop into the following directory: 

> **C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\system**

> - Open user.cfg with notepad
> - Change the line that says **leagueClientOptIn = yes** to **leagueClientOptIn = no** and then save the changes and close the file
> - Set League to "[**Run as Administrator**](http://www.pcadvisor.co.uk/how-to/windows/how-run-programs-as-administrator-in-windows-10-3632744/)"
> - Go to **(C:\Riot Games\League of Legends)** and delete the **LeagueClient.exe** file.
> - Launch League and select the Upgrade option
> - Update and patch the new client

Let me know if this worked for you. ^.^

I found a fix on reddit and confirmed it by myself to work when done correctly. make sure to click upgrade to beta client while patching.
